#summary The screen.updateInterval property
#labels about-dom,is-dom-property,from-microsoft

== Values ==

The `screen.updateInterval` property returns an integer.

[BrowserFamilyMSIE Internet Explorer] always seems to return `0` for this property.

This property is read/write.
